lines.line_text: Nor ever rov'd beyond the Scene

stanzas.stanza_text:
HOW bless'd the Swain of
Who ne'er a Court beheld,
Nor ever rov'd beyond the Scene
Of his paternal Field!

lines.line_text: BUT, where he prov'd the Go-cart's Aid,
One only House his Mansion made,

stanzas.stanza_text:
BUT, where he prov'd the Go-cart's Aid,
He prov'd the Crutch's too;
One only House his Mansion made,
Till Life (tho' late) withdrew.

lines.line_text: FALSE Fortune ne'er, with Smile or Frown,
Her Frowns and Smiles were both unknown

stanzas.stanza_text:
FALSE Fortune ne'er, with Smile or Frown,
Or rais'd him, or deprest;
Her Frowns and Smiles were both unknown
To his contented Breast.

lines.line_text: THE Chance of Stocks he never try'd,
Nor knew to buy or sell;
So scap'd the dreadful golden Tide,

stanzas.stanza_text:
THE Chance of Stocks he never try'd,
Nor knew to buy or sell;
So scap'd the dreadful golden Tide,
Where  Merchants fell.

lines.line_text: SKILL'D in no Bus'ness but his own,
Nor ever prov'd the smoky Town,

stanzas.stanza_text:
SKILL'D in no Bus'ness but his own,
He shunn'd the noisy Bar;
Nor ever prov'd the smoky Town,
But breath'd a purer Air.

lines.line_text: Nor kept an Almanack, to shew

stanzas.stanza_text:
NOR by  he knew
The rolling Year to bound;
Nor kept an Almanack, to shew
How Seasons vary'd round.

HE  knew by Heat extreme,
The  by its Cold;
POMONA shew'd when  came,
When  gay FLORA told.

lines.line_text: HE planted once an Acorn small,
And liv'd to see it rise
A mighty Oak, so wond'rous tall,
It seem'd to prop the Skies.

stanzas.stanza_text:
HE planted once an Acorn small,
And liv'd to see it rise
A mighty Oak, so wond'rous tall,
It seem'd to prop the Skies.

lines.line_text: AND, by the Shade its Branches cast,
What Hour, and how his Moments past,

stanzas.stanza_text:
AND, by the Shade its Branches cast,
Could he much truer know,
What Hour, and how his Moments past,
Than by the Clock of

lines.line_text: THO'  stood so near his Cot,

stanzas.stanza_text:
THO'  stood so near his Cot,
He never mark'd the ;
But thought  as far remote,
As  Church at

lines.line_text: Nor knew, but that the  roll'd

stanzas.stanza_text:
OF  he was only told,
But ne'er beheld her Streams;
Nor knew, but that the  roll'd
Near as the neighb'ring

lines.line_text: OF Jellies, Creams, Ragoûs, and Tarts,
A perfect Stranger to the Arts,

stanzas.stanza_text:
OF Jellies, Creams, Ragoûs, and Tarts,
His Stomach never thought;
A perfect Stranger to the Arts,
Luxurious Cooks have taught!

lines.line_text: YET, with a simple Food supply'd,
That when his ancient Children dy'd,

stanzas.stanza_text:
YET, with a simple Food supply'd,
His Health was so intire,
That when his ancient Children dy'd,
They left a youthful Sire.

lines.line_text: LET others search for golden Bliss
Their Joys of Life are less than his,

stanzas.stanza_text:
LET others search for golden Bliss
On  wealthy Shore;
Their Joys of Life are less than his,
Their Labours ten times more.
